name: 爪子攻擊

effect.description: The user slashes the target with sharp claws, dealing physical damage. There is a 20% chance to inflict Bleeding for 3 turns.

skillVisualPrompt: 8-bit pixel art animation on a solid pure green screen background (Hex: #00FF00). Three white diagonal slash lines appear suddenly across the center of the screen, followed by bright yellow and orange pixel sparks at the impact points. The slashes fade quickly with a retro motion blur effect.
statusVisualPrompt: 8-bit pixel art animation on a solid pure green screen background (Hex: #00FF00). Small, bright red pixel droplets pulsing and falling slowly from the character's mid-section to represent a bleeding effect.
